verbs.description: The mayor of Oakland [V: is] firing back at President Donald Trump over his suggestion that the Department of Justice investigate her for obstruction of justice .

[ARG0: The mayor of Oakland] is [V: firing] [ARGM-DIR: back] [ARGM-DIR: at President Donald Trump] [ARGM-CAU: over his suggestion that the Department of Justice investigate her for obstruction of justice] .
The mayor of Oakland is firing back at President Donald Trump over his suggestion that [ARG0: the Department of Justice] [V: investigate] [ARG1: her] [ARG2: for obstruction of justice] .
